name: Vanilla Tweaks
author: Zsar
description:
? Derinkuyu Station UI name shortened to in-game name
? multi-barreled non-PD guns now shoot all barrels simultaneously
? Remnants of Task Force Safeguard behave like all other unique ships
- missiles Breach SRM tag CONSERVE_ALL
? wing Gladius
  ? role to INTERCEPTOR from FIGHTER
  ? tag
    + rapid_reform
    ? to interceptor from fighter
    ? to interceptor2 from fighter2
? wing Thunder
  ? role to INTERCEPTOR from FIGHTER
  ? tag
    + rapid_reform
    ? to interceptor2 from fighter2
